{{cpp/experimental/simd_mask/title|size}}
{{cpp/experimental/simd/simd_mask/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | since=parallelism_ts_2 | 1=
static constexpr size_t size() noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

返回 {{tt|simd_mask&lt;T, Abi&gt;}} 的宽度（值的数量）。

===示例===
{{example
|The actual output depends on target and compiler flags.
|code=
#include &lt;experimental/simd&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
namespace stdx = std::experimental;

int main()
{
    stdx::native_simd_mask&lt;int&gt; a { true };
    std::cout &lt;&lt; a.size() &lt;&lt; '\n';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; popcount(a) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
16
16
}}

===参阅===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/simd/dsc simd_size}}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/simd/simd/dsc size}}
{{dsc end}}
